original_text: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels of my gold and of my silver, which I had given thee, and madest to thyself images of men, and didst commit whoredom with them,
korean_text: 네가 또 내가 준 금, 은 장식품으로 너를 위하여 남자 우상을 만들어 행음하며

sentences.original_text: Thou hast also taken thy fair jewels
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 또한 너의 아름다운 보석들을 취했고

sentences.original_text: of my gold and of my silver
and madest to thyself images of men
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 너를 위해 남자들의 형상을 만들었고

sentences.original_text: and didst commit whoredom with them
